item.description:
Special 9/11 Symposium - Nov. 3, W. Hartford, CT
Presented by Citizens for a New 9/11 Investigation

Join us for a powerful one-day symposium on Saturday, November 3, 2007
Saint Joseph College - The Carol Autorino Center - Hoffman Auditorium
1678 Asylum Avenue; West Hartford , CT 06117

Co-Sponsored by: Architect & Engineers for 9/11 Truth - Scholars for 9/11 Truth & Justice - The Feal Good Foundation - Student Scholars for 9/11 Truth - 911truth.org

Join us for an authoritative one-day symposium exploring the questions that still surround the events of September 11th, 2001. Our intention is to bring the undisclosed stories, testimony and evidence concerning 9/11 into mainstream public discourse. It is our belief that an educated public will demand new independent investigations that will ultimately lead to our larger goals of justice and redress for the countless victims of 9/11 and its aftermath.

Time: 10:00 a.m. - 10:00 p.m. with lunch and dinner breaks

Speakers:

William Pepper, International Human Rights Attorney - Commissioner of New York City 9/11 Ballot Initiative ( www.nyc911initiative.org)

John Feal, 9/11 First Responder - Founder of the FealGood Foundation, a non-profit organization advocating for 9/11 first responders

Richard Gage, AIA Architect - Founder of Architects & Engineers for 9/11 Truth

Donna Marsh O'Connor, 9/11 Family Member - Mother of Vanessa Lang Langer, WTC Tower II, 93rd floor and www.911truth.org Advisory Board member

Steven Jones, Ph.D. Physicist - Founder of Scholars for Truth & Justice

Robert McIlvaine, 9/11 Family Member - Father of Robert G. McIlvaine, 106th Floor, North Tower

Sofia, Producer & Director of "911 Mysteries"

Gordon Haberman, 9/11 Family Member ? Father of Andrea Lyn Haberman, 92nd Floor, WTC Tower I

= = = = = = = = = = =

Costs:
Early Ticket Purchase before October 27th $30,
after October 27th, $40; Student/Seniors $20

To get tickets please go online to get tickets at www.eventbrite.com/event/74884983

Or send checks payable to Hartford International Conference
PO Box 270257 West Hartford, CT 06127-0257

How You Can Help:

We would sincerely appreciate your financial help to bring these outstanding presenters to New England and help promote this event well to make it a resounding success. Please consider making a donation to support this effort via Paypal - to the email address HIC100307@yahoo.com or please send donations checks payable to: Hartford International Conference, PO Box 270257 West Hartford , CT 06127-0257 ------ Credit card donations can be made by calling (831) 325-3135.

Contact Us: Citizens for a New 9/11 Investigation: For those who would like to help with any aspect of this effort from outreach and publicity to volunteering some part of the day please contact any of these members of the organizing committee: Cheryl Curtiss 860-922-5803 / chercurt@aol.com, Ragen Gillam 630-399-1376 / r.gillam@comcast.net, Gabriel Day 707-845-4444 / sharethetruth911@yahoo.com, Laura Sykes 860-658-9938 / hfdljs@yahoo.com, Steve Goodale 413-658-7611 / sggoodale@yahoo.com, Damon Bean, Media Contact - 860-559-8203 / tigerbean1@mac.com

For more information, with links to download flyers: 911hartford.org

CAR POOLING - A group of us are meeting at the parking area at Northampton High School to carpool to Hartford symposium. Meeting Saturday, November 3rd at the high school, (off of rte 9 about a mile west of town), at 8:30 am, leaving area at 8:45 am.
item.name: 9/11 Family, First Responders, & Experts Speak Out!
